# Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig>
## Announcement of Opening Registration for the First Time or Re-registration with the Kuwait Airways Tenders and Auctions Committee for the Year 2025
Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> announces the opening of registration for all local companies, institutions, and individuals within the State of Kuwait who wish to register with the Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> Tenders and Auctions Committee <orig>لجنة المناقصات والمزايدات</orig> throughout the year 2025, from Sunday to Thursday, from 8:00 AM to 2:00 PM each week.
Companies, institutions, and individuals wishing to register for the first time or re-register for the year 2025 must fulfill all the requirements and submit all the necessary documents to complete the registration process with the Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> Tenders and Auctions Committee <orig>لجنة المناقصات والمزايدات</orig>, attached to a registration request addressed from the companies, institutions, or individuals to the Secretary of the Tenders Committee <orig>أمين سر لجنة المناقصات</orig>.

It should be noted that the document submitted for registration by the company will be stamped with the (Registration) seal for the year 2025, specific to the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig>, which indicates that the registration of the company, individuals, or institutions with the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> is valid until 31/12/2025. It is also required to submit the necessary valid and renewed documents and licenses from the competent government and regulatory authorities in the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig> for the activities of companies, institutions, and individuals, each according to the nature of their work. Individuals are exempt from submitting the documents mentioned in clauses (2/6/8) attached to the circular "Registration Application Attachment". Companies, institutions, and individuals who have applied to register will be contacted in the event they do not submit any document or if there are any deficiencies in the aforementioned documents attached to the circular, via the approved email of those companies and institutions mentioned in their submitted registration application, or when the company's representative attends in person at the office of the Secretariat of the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> to submit these registration documents.

In case of any inquiries from companies, institutions, or individuals wishing to register for the first time or to re-register, they should contact the email designated for the work of the Tenders and Auctions Committee <orig>لجنة المناقصات والمزايدات</orig> at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig>. Please note that registration with the Tenders and Auctions Committee is annual and free of any financial fees.

The sole approved email for the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> is: kwijtku@kuwaitairways.com

### Documents Required for Registration or Re-registration with the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways for the year 2025

1. A letter in Arabic addressed to the Acting Secretary of the Tenders and Auctions Committee <orig>أمين سر لجنة المناقصات والمزايدات بالتكليف</orig>, stating the desire of the company / institution / individual to register with the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig>, without mentioning any amounts or price offers.
2. A recent copy of the registration certificate with the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig> in the State of Kuwait.
3. A copy of the signature authorization for the authorized signatory.
4. A copy of the Civil ID <orig>البطاقة المدنية</orig> of the authorized signatory.
5. A statement listing the names of at least three previous works carried out by the entity wishing to register with Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig>, whether with private or governmental bodies within the State of Kuwait, without attaching documents or contracts related to the projects undertaken by the companies.
6. A copy of a valid National Labor Percentage Certificate.
7. All necessary licenses from government authorities and competent regulatory bodies in the State of Kuwait for the activities of companies, institutions, and individuals, each according to the nature of their work, which must be valid.
8. A license status statement for the company wishing to register, indicating that the file status is "Active," issued by the Manpower Authority <orig>القوى العاملة</orig> and is valid. No other status will be accepted.
9. The approved email address, and landline and mobile phone numbers of the company / institution / individuals who will be registering and following up with the office of the Secretariat of the Tenders and Auctions Committee at Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> with these entities.

The bid form and its attachments, filled out and sealed by the authorized signatory <orig>المفوض بالتوقيع</orig>, as well as the original bid bond <orig>التأمين الأولي الأصلي</orig> of K.D. 50,000/-, valid for a period of not less than 90 days from the specified closing date, shall be deposited in the designated box (B) located at Kuwait Oil Tanker Company – Shuwaikh Administrative Area <orig>الشويخ الإدارية</orig> – Ground Floor.
